alert.note: Alert for Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 23 at 6:15PM MDT until June 23 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CAMPBELL COUNTY... At 615 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located 13 miles west of Rochelle, or 20 miles southeast of Wright, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Campbell County. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
